pageProduct.name: OGX Argan Oil of Morocco Extra Strength Tame & Shine Cream 177ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

OGX Argan Oil of Morocco Tame & Shine Cream a moisturizing cream infused with exotic argan oil of Morocco helps to hydrate hair, control fizz & flyaways and define strands. Discover shine, softness and seductive silky perfection.

Size: 177mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

Warnings

Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately. Keep away from children.

Ingredients

Aqua/Water/Eau, Isopropyl Myristate, Cetearyl Alcohol, PVP, Polyacrylamide, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Ceteareth-20, Laureth-7, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Parfum/Fragrance, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate.

Directions

What You Do... Apply to palm, rub hands together then apply evenly to damp hair, working through to ends. Style as usual.

USAGE ADVICE

For best results use in conjunction with other OGX hair products.
